summary: This is an email from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York regarding a DHO (Disciplinary Hearing Officer) packet for inmate Jeffrey Epstein, referencing his inmate number 76318-054. It indicates administrative procedures were being followed for Epstein while he was in custody.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the DHO (Disciplinary Hearing Officer) packet, identified by his inmate number 76318-054.

events.title: DHO Packet Preparation for Epstein
events.description: An email is sent regarding a Disciplinary Hearing Officer (DHO) packet for inmate Jeffrey Epstein, with a hard copy to be placed in the DHO mailbox.

locations.name: Metropolitan Correctional Center
locations.context: The federal detention facility in Manhattan where Jeffrey Epstein was held.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated July 30, 2019, concerning administrative procedures for Jeffrey Epstein while incarcerated.
Jeffrey Epstein's inmate number is identified as 76318-054.
The correspondence originates from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York City.
The subject references a 'DHO Packet,' indicating disciplinary or administrative hearing procedures were in progress.
The date places this communication shortly before Epstein's death in custody on August 10, 2019.
